com.samsung.spen.lib.input

Class SPenLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.spen.lib.input.SPenLibrary

  • public class SPenLibrary
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class to check finger and pen events in the S Pen library.
    Since:
    S-Pen SDK 2.1

      • SPenLibrary

    • Method Detail

      • getEvent

        public static SPenEvent getEvent(MotionEvent motionEvent)
        Always returns the object of filled with the values taken from motionEvent. The caller must check whether the returned object is a pen or finger event.
        Parameters:
        motionEvent - The event obtained in the onTouchEvent method
        Returns:
        An object with x/y-coordinates and pressure
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.1
